QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: The InstalledProductImage association identifies the InstalledProduct instance representing the collection of installed features and elements for a particular product's installed instance.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: The product that has been installed and created the software features and software elements on the system.

QUALIFIER.NAME: Description
QUALIFIER.VALUE: The collection representing the set of software features and elements that are the result of one product installation.
